Header.title: Impact Auto Systems
Header.paragraph: Crafting innovative solutions for automation and precision machining. With over 15 years of experience, we specialize in designing and manufacturing Special Purpose Machines, Injection Moulding & Press Tool Dies, Semi-Automatic Assembly Lines, and more. Let us propel your projects forward with our engineering expertise and commitment to quality.

About.paragraph: We are a passionate team of professionals dedicated to pushing the boundaries of innovation in the field of automation and machine building. With decades of combined experience, we pride ourselves on our ability to deliver cutting-edge solutions tailored to meet the unique needs of our clients. Our commitment to excellence is evident in every project we undertake, from designing and manufacturing special purpose machines to providing comprehensive automation solutions. At our core, we believe in the power of collaboration and strive to cultivate long-lasting relationships with our clients, built on trust, integrity, and a shared vision for success. Together, we are shaping the future of automation, one innovative solution at a time.

Services.name: Special Purpose Machines
Services.text: 15 years' experience in custom special-purpose machine design & build. Click for subcategories.
Services.description: Our specialized machines are designed and built to meet specific industrial needs, ensuring efficiency and reliability. We work closely with clients to develop custom solutions that optimize production processes and enhance overall operational efficiency.

subcategories.title: Assembly Equipment
subcategories.description: Custom-designed assembly equipment for efficient production processes.

subcategories.description: Expert designing services for special purpose machines and equipment.

subcategories.description: Automated solutions for loading and unloading materials and products.

subcategories.description: High-quality fixtures and press tools for precision manufacturing.

subcategories.title: Test Rigs
subcategories.description: Customized test rigs for quality assurance and product testing.

Services.name: Electrical Panel Wiring
Services.text: Our electrical panel wiring services ensure optimal functionality and safety for your machinery.
Services.description: We provide meticulous electrical panel wiring services that adhere to industry standards, ensuring safety and reliability. Our expertise includes designing and installing panel wiring solutions tailored to various industrial applications, ensuring seamless integration and long-term performance.

Services.name: PLC Programming
Services.text: We offer comprehensive PLC programming solutions for all types of automation systems.
Services.description: Our PLC programming solutions cover a wide range of automation needs, ensuring seamless integration and operational efficiency. We specialize in developing custom PLC programs that enhance automation processes, improve productivity, and reduce downtime across diverse industrial sectors.

Services.name: Machine Tools & Accessories
Services.text: We design and manufacture high-quality machine tools and accessories for various industries.
Services.description: We specialize in the design and manufacturing of precision machine tools and accessories tailored to industry-specific requirements. Our solutions include the development of cutting-edge tools that optimize manufacturing processes, improve product quality, and reduce production costs.

Services.name: Conveyors & Material Handling
Services.text: Our conveyor and material handling systems ensure smooth and efficient operations.
Services.description: Our conveyor and material handling systems are designed to optimize workflow efficiency and ensure reliable operation in various industrial settings. We provide turnkey solutions that include the design, installation, and maintenance of conveyors and handling systems tailored to specific industry needs.

Team.name: M.Palanivel
Team.description: Palanivel started his career at TVS Wabco in 2009, then worked as an SPM Project Engineer at Dynamic Techno System from 2010 to 2018. In 2019, he founded Impact Auto Components, which has efficiently supplied all OEMs for six years under his leadership.
Team.alt: M.Palanivel Founder of Impact auto components

Contact.address: 21E,Chennai Bypass Road, Tass Industrial Estate, Sidco Industrial Estate, Ambattur, Chennai - 600058
